subject: Wishing good thoughts to those in the path of the storm
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
I just wanted to take a moment this morning to send out my well wishes to those who went thru the hurricane last night or who are dealing with the aftermath today. Hope everyones ok and check in to let me know you are when you get a chance. Over a million without power today so some may not be able to get online for a bit.

BIG HUGGGGGZZZZ

Misty
